scripts.start: yarn run build && concurrently --kill-others --raw 'yarn run watch' 'yarn run serve'
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: sass static/sass/styles.scss static/css/styles.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build-js: yarn run build-global-nav && yarn run build-cookie-policy && yarn run build-latest-news
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .bundle
scripts.lint-python: flake8 webapp tests && black --check --line-length 79 webapp tests
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
